title: Cannot load into games.
body:
Since the most recent patch 9/10 times when I attempt to load into a game, I leave champion select and get to the loading screen. No champion portraits pop up and I get a page telling me the client stopped responding and it crashes.

It goes back to the client with the reconnect button after this.

Sometimes I get lucky and I get through after restarting the client or just spam clicking reconnect -> close -> reconnect repeat.

Is there any known fix for this? So far I have reinstalled the client twice and run the repair tool twice, and done the flushdns process in the command prompt.  It's extremely infuriating not being able to connect to ranked games and losing LP for something I cannot control.

replies.body: Was this after a Windows 10 Anniversary Update?

It sounds like this may be caused by one of the recent windows updates that changed some features inside the OS. Both the [Windows game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and [SmartScreen](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168) have been causing problems for some players trying to join games. I recommend disabling them with the guides I linked and let me know if they resolved the issue.
